Composition ToolkitBeta
Community-driven resources for digital pedagogy in composition, rhetoric, and literature.

Documentation

About

Composition Toolkit is a source for teaching materials for composition, rhetoric, and literature courses. It is an open source website

CC license

Contributing

Getting started with GitHub

Add a new teaching resource 

* [title](url)

For instance, a link to Purdue OWL: Close Reading Strategies is written in markdown as the following.

* [Purdue OWL: Close Reading Strategies](http://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/616/01/)

Composition Toolkit is the result of a project in the Department of English at the University of Victoria. Grant funding provided by the Learning and Teaching Centre. Web development by Alex Christie. Built with Jekyll and GitHub Pages
